<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to pass &#96;const&#96; values PGOCtxProfContext references to the yaml</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// converter, and the regular yaml mapping APIs are designed to handle both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// serialization and deserialization, which prevents using const for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// serialization. Using an intermediate datastructure is overkill, both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// space-wise and design complexity-wise. Instead, we use the lower-level APIs.</span></CodeLine>
